author: rafaellopesdesa
body:
This is a standalone producer so that users can apply the latest GED electron/photon regression without changing the RECO sequence in 8_0_X. The regressions are taken from the conditions database as suggested by @slava77 . We also added the option of reading from a local sqlite file. General instructions for the users are described here:

https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/EGMRegression

We still need a bit of work to release this product (for instance, the EGMSmearer has to be rederived for this specific regression), but the code is ready so I am doing the PR right now so that we have time to review it while these last steps are taken.

A similar PR will exist for 81X and 90X but it will modify the RECO sequence as well. However, before I do these PR, I would like that my TAGS are included in the GT. I am in contact with AlCa to add them:

https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2774.html

This PR is not supposed to have any effect in any validation step. 

Attention: @fcouderc , @ikrav , @gzevi
title: 80X EGM Regression
